posts.post_content:
Considering all the other voices were 2/2 fliers with protection form a designated color and were still awesome, then why are people giving good ole voice of all crap? a 2/2 flier for 2w is decent, adding one more w and the OPTION to pick a color is down right ridiculous.   
  
I will say I love the shenanigans I was able to pull off with this card and kiki jiki/splinter twin in my EDH deck. Its surprising how useful a practically unblockable/indestructible flier whenever you need it is awesome.
